content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[EOSWeatherCleansed]
(
	Date	datetime2(7),
	 Year	int,
	 Month	int,
	 Day    int,
	 LOCATION	nvarchar(200),	
	 MaxTemp	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 MinTemp	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 AvgTemp	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 GDD3	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 GDD10	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 CUMGDD3	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 CUMGDD10	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 IsGrowingSeason	FLOAT,
	 SurfaceSoilMoisture nvarchar(100),	
	 RootzoneSoilMoisture	nvarchar(100),	
	 WindSpeed	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 Humidity	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 Precipitation	DECIMAL(6,2),
	 HeatStress	int,
	 ColdStress	int,
	 GrowthStage nvarchar(100),	
	 Pmaxacc DECIMAL(6,2)
)
-- WITH(
--  DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
--  CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
-- )
WITH
(
	LOCATION = 'datasourcefilesystem001/Cleansed/EOS/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [datasourcefilesystem001_datasourceaccount001_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
)

-- SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.EOSWeatherCleansed
-- GO

-- EOSWeatherCleansed.parquet
-- DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EOSWeatherCleansed
